bookList.title: Dune
bookList.author: Frank Herbert
bookList.description: A science fiction epic set on the desert planet Arrakis, where noble houses fight for control of the valuable spice melange.

bookList.title: Neuromancer
bookList.author: William Gibson
bookList.description: A cyberpunk novel following a washed-up hacker hired for a mysterious job in a dystopian future.

bookList.title: Pride and Prejudice
bookList.author: Jane Austen
bookList.description: A romantic novel exploring love, class, and social expectations in 19th-century England.

bookList.author: George Orwell
bookList.description: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism, surveillance, and the loss of personal freedom.

bookList.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
bookList.author: Stieg Larsson
bookList.description: A gripping mystery involving a hacker and a journalist investigating a decades-old disappearance.

bookList.title: Gone Girl
bookList.author: Gillian Flynn
bookList.description: A psychological thriller about a missing woman and the secrets in her marriage.
